snippet: It’s possible to own gold through an exchange-traded fund, but some investors want the real thing: shiny bars stashed in a vault.
abstract: It is possible to own gold through an exchange-traded fund, but some investors want the real thing: gold bullion bars stashed in a professionally managed vault; hedge fund manager Dan Tapiero keeps gold portion of his portfolio in Manhattan vault.
lead_paragraph: It’s possible to own gold through an exchange-traded fund, but some investors want the real thing: shiny bars stashed in a vault.

headline.seo: Some Gold Investors Want Their Own Fort Knox
headline.main: How About a Fort Knox of Your Own?
headline.print_headline: How About a Fort Knox of Your Own?
